outcomes.name: Increased Developer Velocity
outcomes.description: Reduce time from idea to production for new features.

outcomes.name: Improved System Reliability
outcomes.description: Decrease downtime and increase MTBF for critical systems.

outcomes.name: Enhanced Developer Experience
outcomes.description: Improve developer satisfaction and reduce cognitive load.

drivers.name: Faster Build & Deploy Times
drivers.description: Optimize CI/CD pipelines for quicker feedback loops.

drivers.name: Simplified Development Environment
drivers.description: Standardize local and remote development setups.

drivers.name: Self-Service Tooling
drivers.description: Provide developers with tools to manage their own resources.

levers.name: CI/CD Pipeline Optimization
levers.description: Introduce parallelization and caching in build processes.

levers.name: Internal Developer Platform (IDP)
levers.description: A unified platform for all developer resources.

levers.name: DevContainer Standardization
levers.description: Use standardized development containers across all projects.

levers.name: Observability Platform Rollout
levers.description: Deploy a new observability platform (e.g., OpenTelemetry).
